args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Starter-Generator Electrical Connection May Fail

BMW of North America, LLC (BMW) is recalling certain 2025 330i, 330i xDrive, 530i, 530i xDrive, 4 Series Coupe (430i, 430i xDrive), 4 Series Convertible (430i, 430i xDrive), 4 Series Gran Coupe (430i, 430i xDrive) and X3 30 xDrive vehicles.  The electrical connection between the starter-generator and battery may come loose.A loose starter-generator connection can result in an engine stall, increasing the risk of a crash.  In addition, the wiring may overheat, increasing the risk of a fire.

Number of Units Affected: 4397.0"
